Womply | http://womply.com/ | Portland, OR | Backend Engineer | ONSITE | Full time

Womply helps small businesses to grow, protect and simplify their business by providing tools to understand their revenue, social reputation and customers.

We are looking for a junior java engineer to join one of our backend teams. A solid understanding of java is required, as well as a good grasp of programming fundamentals, but we are not overly academically focused (we won't ask you to invert a binary tree on a whiteboard).

Our stack makes use of a variety of fun technologies like docker, kafka, zookeeper, cassandra and postgres, but familiarity with those is not a requirement.

Feel free to contact me directly at sbock@womply.com or go through our site. Include a resume and link to some of your code.
